context.p: A pod within the Deployment Inventory Tool is intended to be a representation of a cloud pod. It includes information like the name of the Pod, the url to authenticate against and the Network details.
Create a new pod for the Deployment Inventory Tool

info.p: Click the pod view from the nav bar at the top
Click the Create new pod button
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Restrictions on the fields are as follows:

ul.li: Name must be between 5 and 20 characters
Authentication URL must be a valid URL
Network: at least one valid network is needed
Network Name must be unique within the pod
Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol Range Start must be an integer between 1 and 255
Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol Range End must be an integer between 1 and 255
IPv4 and IPv6 subnet cidr must be a valid cidr address
IPv4 and IPv6 subnet gateway ip must be a valid address

info.p: Click the Save button and you will be redirected back to the previous page
NOTE: Pod will not save if any fields are invalid (RED in UI)

result.p: A New Pod is created in the Deployment Inventory Tool.
